verses.verse: Now <WG1161> it came <WG1279> to pass <WG1096> on <WG1722> a sabbath <WG4521>, that <WG1279> he <WG846> was going <WG1279> through <WG1223> the grainfields <WG4719>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> plucked <WG5089> the ears <WG4719>, and <WG2532> did eat <WG2068>, rubbing <WG5597> them in <WG5495> their hands <WG5495>.
